knimeNode.name: Variable to Table Column
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends one or more variables as new column(s) to the data table.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts variables that are carried along the flow and appends them to an input table.
fullDescription.option: Include list contains all variables that are converted into new columns in the resulting table, excluded variables are not used. All variables remain on the variable stack. Enforce exclusion and inclusion options can be used to force all new variables to be included or excluded, resp.
fullDescription.link: KNIME E-Learning Course: Creation and usage of Flow Variables in a KNIME workflow

ports.inPort: Data table to which the flow variables are appended as columns
ports.outPort: The input table with additional columns, one for each selected variable. All values in the new column will be the same.
